discription: Job Role· Analyze data come up with solutions (using available tools).· Create, analyses and maintain explanatory/predictive statistical models.· Work includes all phases of the modeling process: research design, data extraction and cleaning, model building and validation.· To work through the entire life cycle of a project from inception to implementation.· Co-ordinate with different SMEs for seeking the inputs to explore data extraction approach and road map the analysis mile stones.· Articulate complex problems narrated vaguely into precise business requirements & technical specifications· Develop and maintain working relationships with key customer stakeholders Requirements· Exp. Range -3-8 years of work experience in the area(s) of advance statistical analysis/modeling/data mining/Machine Learning· Proficiency required in one or more of analytical tools such as R, Python, Matlab.· Experience in at least two of the areaso Statistical modeling (Regression, Classification, Time-series forecasting) /Machine Learning /Text Mining /Optimization /Visualization· Knowledge on Machine Learning Techniques and R, SQL, would be added advantage· Knowledge of statistical tools and techniques, especially those relating to data mining· Demonstrated ability to work with large data sets· 2-4 years of work experience in the area of Supply Chain Analytics/ service event/ incidents analytics  Skills· Ability to move data around, from a database or an API, through a transformation or to a model and into human-readable form (ROC curve, Excel chart, map, d3 visualization, Tableau, etc.)· Experience with Python, R,SQL, Matlab.· Ability to initiate & act, deal with ambiguity, experiment and turn losses into wins by moving forward· Complex, undefined problems and petabytes challenge you.

discription:
This Job is eligible for the following work arrangements : Flex Time
The Services Insights team is chartered to enable positive business outcomes by driving right behaviors and decisions through bold insights. 
The Data Scientist is a linchpin role working within the Services Business Insights team. This person will work with cross-functional teams across the Services organization to effectively manage and deliver on Insights & Analytics, operations and transformation. In this critical Program, you will be responsible for executing on business objectives through analytical modeling that incorporate HQ functions, consulting domain leadership and area/field leadership thereby creating transparency around insights & analytics initiatives through a rhythm of the business (ROB). You will execute on the detailed implementation, and support of analytical models, tools and techniques including process changes that are part of this program. We are looking for a talented and motivated analytics professional who can build predictive models and solve a wide variety of predictive analytics problems - all with the goal of providing actionable insights into business processes and customer experience. You will contribute to continuing the team s progress toward being a recognized hub for forward thinking in the field of advanced data analytics. The team consists of experts in statistical data analysis, machine learning, driver analysis, forecasting, big data technologies, fraud analytics, and clickstream analytics etc. For the right individual, this job offers a gateway to an ocean of opportunities in the area of: Predicting customers  next issues to solve them proactively Implementing production natural language processing and classification Building simulations to test and optimize processes Providing analytics on clickstream data for as many customers each year as Facebook has users Using data to optimize sales opportunities, identify support issues and understand customers Proactively identifying service and quality issues before customers realize there is a problem Detecting fraud and preventing loss of millions of dollars KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES: Build and develop analytical models working along side a strong team of Leads, Analysts, Architects to deliver priority outcomes in alignment with the strategic roadmap for Services Engage broadly with the Decision Science teams to frame, structure and prioritize business problems where insights can have the biggest impact Act as an evangelist and catalyst for BI & Analytics innovation Manage the portfolio of work for BI & Analytics and partner with decision science team on monthly governance with stakeholders Partner on a robust, sustainable cloud first big data architecture, data lake, data mart and other assorted reporting/distribution services with the data engineering teams Partner with data science team to apply advanced analytics concepts towards rich and bold insights Attract, develop, retain talent and improving productivity, efficiency and effectiveness of the team and / or business. Create and manage standards, processes and procedures to ensure agile delivery and consistent operations. KEY QUALIFICATIONS: 8+ years of analytical hands on experience across Regression(Linear/Logit/Gamma), K-Means/Modes/Hier. Clustering, Markov Chain Monte Carlo, Non Linear Time Series. Text mining, Dynamic Programming, Hypothesis testing, OR and Optimization techniques, Fraud Analytics etc. Proven track record of delivering highly-scalable and reliable systems through multiple cycles. Experience on Microsoft BI stack and exposure to Big Data, machine learning and data mining, large scale computing systems like COSMOS, Hadoop, MapReduce and other big data technologies including experience in SQL, R, Python, SAS, AzureML or similar languages. Design and BI architecture skills, partnering with engineering & information architecture teams on design & architecture Excellent communications and interpersonal skills. Ability to convince other strong personalities of their ideas and work with a large number of partners in solving a problem. Masters in Statistics/Econometrics or PhD in Statistics/Economics/ Computer Science or related discipline is preferable, but a candidate with MS combined with strong analytical background in problems relating to Big Data and Analytics is also acceptable. PERSONAL ATTRIBUTES/INTERPERSONAL SKILLS: o Excellent written and oral communication skills, particularly the ability to synthesize complex issues/scenarios into easy-to-understand concepts. o An attention to detail with self-discipline and a drive for results. o Demonstrated ability to work in ambiguous situations and across organizational boundaries. Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, religion, national origin, marital status, age, disability, veteran status, genetic information, or any other protected status. Microsoft Services is dedicated to delivering on Microsoft s mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As one of the largest divisions inside Microsoft - with over 21,500 employees worldwide - this diverse team includes architects, consultants, support professionals, sales, and business leaders who serve customers in 191 countries and 46 languages. Simply put, we help customers get the most out of their technology investments. We are proud to be the face of Microsoft to many of our customers and partners. The power of that connection, in addition to understanding how they use our products, helps us deliver the voice of our customers back to our business groups to make our technology and Microsoft even better.

discription:
Work on the core system which powers a highly scalable platform. As a senior member of the

platform team you'll need to support existing platform, and build on new features on product

requirement basis. Also mentor your junior members.

Right from working on the architecture implementation, to scaling up the systems and monitoring of

system resources is the responsibility of this team.

Must Haves:

- Atleast 3+ years of experience in web/mobile app backend development.

- Great problem solver.

- Handled systems with large number of concurrent users.

- Hands-on experience on Python.

- Good understanding of Data Structures, Algorithms, and OS concepts.

- Experience with at-least one modern web-based frameworks.

(Django/NodeJs/Tornado/Something similar or better)

- Expert on Linux/GNU management.

- Good knowledge of MySQL/Mongo/Solr/ElasticSearch/Redis.

Nice to have:

- Designed and developed large distributed systems.

- Experience on Apache httpd, nginx, uwsgi.

- Hands on fabric/Ansible/Vagrant/Docker.

- Experience with Amazon Web Services.

- Experience with setting up reverse proxy and load balancing on nginx/haproxy/etc.
